Uses of Package
co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task

Packages that use co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task
co.cask.coopr.cluster Cluster and Node objects. 
co.cask.coopr.codec.json.current Codecs for serializing and deserializing current versions of objects to and from json. 
co.cask.coopr.common.zookeeper Zookeeper utilities. 
co.cask.coopr.http.request Http requests. 
co.cask.coopr.provisioner Classes for interacting with provisioners. 
co.cask.coopr.provisioner.plugin Classes for managing provisioner plugin data. 
co.cask.coopr.scheduler Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks. 
co.cask.coopr.scheduler.callback Hooks for adding custom logic before and after cluster operations. 
co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs. 
co.cask.coopr.store.cluster Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes. 
 

Classes in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task used by co.cask.coopr.cluster
ClusterJob
          A job contains information related to what needs to be done to perform and coordinate a cluster operation.
ClusterJob.Status
          Job status.
MissingClusterException
          Thrown to indicate that there was a problem creating a cluster job or task.
MissingEntityException
          Thrown to indicate that some type of entity is missing.
 

Classes in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task used by co.cask.coopr.codec.json.current
TaskConfig
          The config section of a cluster task sent to provisioners.
 

Classes in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task used by co.cask.coopr.common.zookeeper
JobId
          Job ids are of the form clusterid-jobid, where ids are numeric.
TaskId
          Task ids are of the format clusterid-jobnum-tasknum, where all ids and numbers are numeric.

Classes in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task used by co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task
ClusterJob
          A job contains information related to what needs to be done to perform and coordinate a cluster operation.
ClusterJob.Status
          Job status.
ClusterTask
          A task is some action that must be executed on a single node in the cluster.
ClusterTask.Status
          Task status.
JobId
          Job ids are of the form clusterid-jobid, where ids are numeric.
MissingEntityException
          Thrown to indicate that some type of entity is missing.
TaskConfig
          The config section of a cluster task sent to provisioners.
TaskId
          Task ids are of the format clusterid-jobnum-tasknum, where all ids and numbers are numeric.
TaskServiceAction
          Service in a TaskConfig, containing the name of the service and the action to be performed.
 

Classes in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task used by co.cask.coopr.store.cluster
ClusterJob
          A job contains information related to what needs to be done to perform and coordinate a cluster operation.
ClusterTask
          A task is some action that must be executed on a single node in the cluster.
JobId
          Job ids are of the form clusterid-jobid, where ids are numeric.
TaskId
          Task ids are of the format clusterid-jobnum-tasknum, where all ids and numbers are numeric.
